title: Topic 001 Question 146
body: A company wants to archive sensitive data on Amazon S3 Glacier. The company’s regulatory and compliance requirements do not allow any modifications to the data by any account.
options: Attach a vault lock policy to an S3 Glacier vault that contains the archived data. Use the lock ID to validate the vault lock policy after 24 hours.
Attach a vault lock policy to an S3 Glacier vault that contains the archived data. Use the lock ID to validate the vault lock policy within 24 hours.
Configure S3 Object Lock in governance mode. Upload all files after 24 hours.
Configure S3 Object Lock in governance mode. Upload all files within 24 hours.
